intro: Ever dreamed of the ultimate American road trip?
description:
Forget airports, hotel bookings, and strict schedules. It’s time to hit the road in your cozy motorhome, where every day brings a new adventure.

In Motorhome: Traveling North America 3, your favorite family is back behind the wheel. 
This time, they’re traveling from Portland to Key West, exploring America’s most breathtaking places, from snowy mountains to sunny coastlines.

- Wake up in the mountains, have lunch by the lake, fall asleep under the stars — all in the comfort of your home on wheels.
- Dive into colorful hidden object scenes filled with nature, cozy charm, and the spirit of the open road.
- Play relaxing mini-games and brain-teasing puzzles that help you unwind.
- Collect unique baseball caps — each location offers a new design, a fun memory, and a piece of American culture.
- Take Polaroid-style photos throughout your journey — every snapshot becomes part of your family’s road trip album.

Collector’s Edition Includes:
- 10 extra hidden object scenes — with more items to find and a mischievous raccoon to spot.
- 8 all-new mini-games + 12 bonus puzzles from previous games.
- A full collection of rare baseball caps — become the ultimate road trip collector!
- A Polaroid photo album to save your favorite memories.
